description: This file defines a Compose UI screen called ContentInfoScreen, which displays detailed information about a media content item, including a hero image, title, metadata, synopsis, and action buttons. It also defines related composables and a data model for the content info.

classes.name: ContentInfo
classes.description: Data class representing detailed information about a media content item, including title, year, duration, rating, genres, synopsis, backdrop resource, badges, cast snippet, and director.

methods.name: ContentInfoScreen
methods.description: Main Composable function that displays the detailed content info UI, including hero image, title, metadata, synopsis, and action buttons.

methods.name: HeroPreview
methods.description: Composable displaying the hero/backdrop image with overlay and action buttons.

methods.name: MetadataRow
methods.description: Composable rendering the genres as chips, director, cast snippet, and badges.

methods.name: ContentInfoMockProvider.sample
methods.description: Provides a sample ContentInfo object for preview purposes.
